overview.role_description:
1. Sanhua is a Glacio sub-DPS focused on Resonance Skill DMG.
2. Sanhua has exceptional Concerto Energy generation.
3. Sanhua's Outro Skill boosts the Basic Attack DMG of the next character.
overview.synopsis:
1. Tip: Intro Skill, Resonance Skill, Resonance Liberation. This leaves behind [Ice Thorn], [Ice Prism], and [Glacier]. Hold Basic Attack, and release when the pointer hits the [Frostbite] zone to trigger [Ice Thorn], [Ice Prism], and [Glacier].
2. Rotation: E-R-H-Q.
3. Team Comp: The most suitable main DPS is Camellya. The team setup of Camellya + Sanhua + Shorekeeper/Verina/Baizhi works well. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.
overview.rotation:
Skill Breakdown
1. Forte Circuit
When Basic Attack is held, a pointer moves across the energy bar. Release Basic Attack within the Forte Gauge [Frostbite] zone to unleash Heavy Attack Detonate (counts as Heavy Attack DMG).
● Heavy Attack Detonate detonates [Ice Thorn], [Ice Prism], and [Glacier] within range, dealing Glacio DMG (counts as Resonance Skill DMG).
● [Frostbite] Expansion: Each 1 stack of [Clarity] widens the [Frostbite] zone. Max 2 stacks.
● [Clarity] Gain: 5th Basic Attack hit, Intro Skill, Resonance Skill, Resonance Liberation. Using Heavy Attack Detonate consumes all [Clarity] stacks.
2. Resonance Liberation
Deal Glacio DMG, leave behind [Glacier].
3. Resonance Skill
Deal Glacio DMG, summon 1 [Ice Prism].
4. Normal Attack
● Basic Attack: up to 5-hit combo.
● Heavy Attack: Consumes STA to attack.
● Mid-air Attack: Consumes STA to perform a Plunging Attack.
● Dodge Counter: Triggered by dodging and shortly tapping Basic Attack.
5. Intro Skill
Deal Glacio DMG, leave behind 1 [Ice Thorn].
6. Outro Skill
Increase Basic Attack DMG of the next character.
Team Comp Analysis:
Sanhua’s Outro Skill increases the Basic Attack DMG of the next character, making her ideal for teams centered around Basic Attack main DPS.
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.
● Cantarella + Sanhua + Shorekeeper/Verina/Baizhi
① Sanhua starts with ERH, not fully stacking Concerto Energy.
② Healer quickly fully charges Concerto Energy.
③ Sanhua re-enters with Intro Skill. Use EHQ to max out Concerto Energy.
④ Cantarella enters with Intro Skill. ERZ - Enhanced EQHE to achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out.
⑤ Repeat.
● Changli + Sanhua + Brant
Sanhua buffs Basic Attack DMG for Brant. Brant provides DPS, healing, and shielding, while boosting Changli’s Fusion and Resonance Skill DMG.
① Changli starts with EA, not fully stacking Concerto Energy.
② Sanhua ERHA to achieve full Concerto Energy.
③ Brant enters with Intro Skill, uses R-H-H, then enhanced E to achieve full Concerto Energy and leave the field.
④ Changli re-enters with Intro Skill, A-EA-EA, H (4 Enflamement stacks) + R + H (4 Enflamement stacks), achieve full Concerto Energy, swap out.
⑤ Repeat.
● Camellya + Sanhua + Shorekeeper/Verina/Baizhi
Sanhua increases Camellya's Basic Attack DMG, with the survival role offering healing or DMG bonus.
① Start with Camellya using E.
② Switch to Sanhua and use ERH without fully charging Concerto Energy.
③ Healer quickly fully charges Concerto Energy.
④ Bring in Camellya for Intro Skill. Use Basic Attack, but don’t max out Concerto Energy.
⑤ Switch to Sanhua EHQ to achieve full Concerto Energy;
⑥ Camellya re-enters with Intro Skill, uses Basic Attack fully charging Concerto Energy. Activates enhanced E + Basic Attack, fully charging Concerto Energy again. Leaves the field.

texts.name: Blazing Brilliance
texts.effectDescription: ATK increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). The wielder gains 1 stack of Searing Feather upon dealing damage, which can be triggered once every 0.5s, and gains 5 stacks of the same effect upon casting Resonance Skill. Each stack of Searing Feather gives (4%/5%/6%/7%/8%) additional Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for up to 14 stacks. After reaching the max stacks, all stacks will be removed in (12/12/12/12/12)s.

texts.name: Red Spring
texts.effectDescription:
Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus for (14/14/14/14/14)s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) times.

When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain (40%/50%/60%/70%/80%) Basic DMG Bonus for (10/10/10/10/10). This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

texts.name: Emerald of Genesis
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). When Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by (6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) time(s). This effect lasts for (10/10/10/10/10)s.

texts.name: Impermanence Heron
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Impermanence Heron to fly up and smack down, dealing 310.56% Havoc DMG.



Long press to stay as Impermanence Heron and continuously spit flames, each attack dealing 55.73% Havoc DMG.



Once the initial attack lands on any enemy, the current character regains 10 Resonance Energy. If the current character uses their Outro Skill within the next 15s, the next character's damage dealt will be boosted by 12% for 15s.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Energy Regen + 10%.

texts.name: Lampylumen Myriad
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Lampylumen Myriad. Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks.



Unleash a freezing shock by performing consecutive forward strikes, with the initial two strikes inflicting 200.16% and 200.16% Glacio DMG respectively, and the final strike dealing 266.88% Glacio DMG. Enemies will be frozen on hit.



Each shock increases the current character's Glacio DMG by 4.00% and Resonance Skill DMG dealt by 4.00% for 15s, stacking up to 3 times



CD: 20s

texts.name: Freezing Frost
texts.description: Glacio DMG + 10% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 3 times, each stack lasts 15s.

texts.name: Freezing Frost
texts.description: Glacio DMG + 10%.

texts.name: Red Spring
texts.effectDescription:
Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus for (14/14/14/14/14)s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) times.

When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain (40%/50%/60%/70%/80%) Basic DMG Bonus for (10/10/10/10/10). This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

texts.name: Nightmare: Crownless
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Nightmare: Crownless and attack enemies in front, dealing 264.60% Havoc DMG. The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Havoc DMG Bonus and 12.00% Basic Attack DMG Bonus.

This skill has 3 initial charges, replenished once every 12s, max 3 charges. When Nightmare: Crownless hits a target, DMG dealt by this skill is increased by 20.00%. This effect lasts for 2s and does not stack.

CD: 12s.

texts.name: Havoc Eclipse
texts.description: Havoc DMG + 7.5% after releasing Basic Attack or Heavy Attack. This effect stacks up to 4 times, each stack lasts 15s.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Condensation
texts.description: Damage dealt by Sanhua's Resonance Skill increased by 20% for 8s after casting her Intro Skill.

texts.name: Avalanche
texts.description: Damage dealt by Sanhua's Forte Circuit Ice Burst is increased by 20% for 8s after casting Basic Attack 5.

texts.name: Silversnow
texts.description: The incoming Resonator has their Basic Attack DMG Amplified by 38% for 14s or until they are switched out.

texts.name: Frigid Light
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Sanhua performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.



Heavy Attack

Sanhua consumes STA to launch attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Sanhua consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.



Dodge Counter

Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

texts.name: Eternal Frost
texts.description: Sanhua sends an air blade to create 1 "Ice Prism" on the ground, dealing Glacio DMG.

texts.name: Clarity of Mind
texts.description:
Heavy Attack: Detonate

When holding Basic Attack, a cursor moves back and forth on the Forte Gauge. Release Basic Attack while cursor falls in the "Frostbite" area, to perform Heavy Attack Detonate, dealing Glacio DMG considered as Heavy Attack DMG.



Ice Burst

Sanhua's Heavy Attack Detonate detonates all "Ice Thorns", "Ice Prisms" and "Glaciers" within her attack range, dealing Glacio DMG. Ice Burst deals Resonance Skill DMG.



Frostbite Area

The "Frostbite" area expands with every 1 stack of "Clarity". "Clarity" stacks up to 2 times.

Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon performing Basic Attack 5.

Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon casting Intro Skill Freezing Thorns.

Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Skill Eternal Frost.

Sanhua obtains 2 stack(s) of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Liberation Glacial Gaze.

Upon casting Heavy Attack Detonate, all "Clarity" is removed.

texts.name: Glacial Gaze
texts.description: Sanhua deals Glacio DMG and creates 1 "Glacier".

texts.name: Freezing Thorns
texts.description: Sanhua swings her blade downward and creates 1 "Ice Thorn", dealing Glacio DMG.

texts.name: Clarity of Mind
texts.description:
Heavy Attack: Detonate

When holding Basic Attack, a cursor moves back and forth on the Forte Gauge. Release Basic Attack while cursor falls in the "Frostbite" area, to perform Heavy Attack Detonate, dealing Glacio DMG considered as Heavy Attack DMG.



Ice Burst

Sanhua's Heavy Attack Detonate detonates all "Ice Thorns", "Ice Prisms" and "Glaciers" within her attack range, dealing Glacio DMG. Ice Burst deals Resonance Skill DMG.



Frostbite Area

The "Frostbite" area expands with every 1 stack of "Clarity". "Clarity" stacks up to 2 times.

Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon performing Basic Attack 5.

Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon casting Intro Skill Freezing Thorns.

Sanhua obtains 1 stack of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Skill Eternal Frost.

Sanhua obtains 2 stack(s) of "Clarity" upon casting Resonance Liberation Glacial Gaze.

Upon casting Heavy Attack Detonate, all "Clarity" is removed.

texts.description: Sanhua deals Glacio DMG and creates 1 "Glacier".

texts.name: Eternal Frost

texts.name: Solitude's Embrace
texts.description: Basic Attack V increases Sanhua's Crit. Rate by 15% for 10s.

texts.name: Snowy Clarity
texts.description: Heavy Attack Detonate STA cost is reduced by 10. When Sanhua casts Resonance Skill Eternal Frost, her resistance to interruption is enhanced for 10s.

texts.name: Anomalous Vision
texts.description: Sanhua's damage dealt is increased by 35% against targets with HP below 70%.

texts.name: Blade Mastery
texts.description:
Resonance Liberation Glacial Gaze restores 10 Resonance Energy. 


DMG of the next Heavy Attack Detonate within 5s is increased by 120%.

texts.name: Unraveling Fate
texts.description: Crit. DMG of Forte Circuit Ice Burst is increased by 100%. Ice Creations (Ice Thorn, Ice Prism, and Glacier) will explode even if they are not detonated.

texts.name: Daybreak Radiance
texts.description: After an Ice Prism or a Glacier is detonated, all team members' ATK is increased by 10% for 20s, stacking up to 2 times.
